snippet: The Millennium Theater in Brooklyn is a bit like a Lincoln Center for Russian-speaking immigrants who live in Brighton Beach, Brooklyn, but still remember their days in Odessa, Tbilisi, Kiev or Minsk.
abstract: Millennium Theater, a Russian-speaking cultural mecca for newly arrived immigrants in Brighton Beach, is seeking to attract new patrons by offering more generic crowd-pleasing shows and advertising in other neighborhoods throughout Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: The Millennium Theater in Brooklyn is a bit like a Lincoln Center for Russian-speaking immigrants who live in Brighton Beach, Brooklyn, but still remember their days in Odessa, Tbilisi, Kiev or Minsk.

headline.seo: Millennium Theater in Brighton Beach as Link to Old Country
headline.main: A Theater Tied by Heartstrings to the Old Country
headline.print_headline: A Theater Tied by Heartstrings to the Old Country
